title: ICT-Based Educational Design for Digital Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Requires educational design considering regional ICT environment differences, referencing research results for African teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain digital competency components (information literacy, digital content creation, technology integration)
Learners can design outputs utilizing at least three types of educational digital content creation tools
Learners can analyze peer learners' digital competency levels through a survey-based mixed-methods research approach.

resources: Digital Content Creation Tools (Canva, PPT, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
